howTo: Example logic can be found below to show syntax. Simply remove // at the beginnging of the attribute name. For example '//excludedTables' becomes 'excludedTables'

excludedTables.description: rgsubset fails due to a cyclical reference
excludedTables.name: store

excludedTables.description: rgsubset fails due to a cyclical reference
excludedTables.name: staff

excludedTables.description: rgsubset fails due to lack of default value for column 'name'
excludedTables.name: category

excludedTables.description: rgsubset fails due to lack of default value for column 'name'
excludedTables.name: language
